Articles.Content:
On 3/22/2021 at 4:48 PM, Roger Workman said:

These shuttle parts sure are a great addition to the game! I was wondering why the command pods require crew to operate though, as I understood Space Rider to be a robotic spacecraft? https://www.esa.int/Enabling_Support/Space_Transportation/Space_Rider

I was able to change the config so it behaves like a probe core, but maybe that is something worth considering for a future update? Thanks for all the great parts in any case though.

Kerbals ar very small compared to humans, they could probably enter the Space Rider no problem. And as a probe core it would be totally OP for stock games.
IS there anyway to disable the LH2 patch? The vulcain engine now requires lh2 the but the Arianne 5 fuel tank still uses liquid fuel.
Hey Well is everything okay ? It is been very quiet here

The Lockheed CEV looks super cool! will it ever be coming back to the mod?

I tried installing an older version, but it just wasn't playing too nice with my game. Does anybody know any other way or place I can get this part? I've been dying to try it out.

15 hours ago, Epcotnerd said:

The Lockheed CEV looks super cool! will it ever be coming back to the mod?

I tried installing an older version, but it just wasn't playing too nice with my game. Does anybody know any other way or place I can get this part? I've been dying to try it out.

The mod was discontinued because it was merged into this mod , you can find the part as CEV Starrider

20 minutes ago, golkaidakhaana said:

The mod was discontinued because it was merged into this mod , you can find the part as CEV Starrider

I know, but I'm looking for the original model. Don't get me wrong, I love the Starrider, but i like the Lockheed design even better.

Edited April 16, 2021 by Epcotnerd
forgot to quote

@golkaidakhaanaCEV Starrider is a completly other shuttle as the Lockheede CEV.
@Epcotnerd You can download an older version of KNES with the CEV. It was deprecated in KNES 1.1 and restored in 1.2 but later finally deleted (as far as I know because Well focused only on french designs). I think 1.2 was the latest version with CEV.

49 minutes ago, Cheesecake said:

@golkaidakhaanaCEV Starrider is a completly other shuttle as the Lockheede CEV.
@Epcotnerd You can download an older version of KNES with the CEV. It was deprecated in KNES 1.1 and restored in 1.2 but later finally deleted (as far as I know because Well focused only on french designs). I think 1.2 was the latest version with CEV.

Thanks for the help, I think the issue may have been that I was using 1.1 instead of 1.2! whoops!

Edited April 16, 2021 by Epcotnerd

On 8/3/2017 at 4:56 PM, Well said:

What is Knes mod?

This is a stockalike parts mod that allows you to create French rockets and european Ariane family & Some Conceptual spacecraft never builded.
The mod adds many number of parts, including launchers and spacecraft parts in a stockalike style.
Early French Rocket (with CatPod to reproduce the first launch of a Cat in space by Veronique Rocket in 1963),
Ariane 5 in 3.75 m Size, Ariane 1, 2, 3 & 4 all variant, European and French Hermes Space Shuttle, IXV, ATV, Viking Capsule and more... 
This mod is made for Kerbals, not to recreate real rockets with the same performance.

 

Supported mods by Compatibility patch ( Module Manager Required for patch):

- Kerbal inventory system(KIS)
- MechJeb
- Tweakscale 
- Pathfinder (Patch by @Space Kadet )
- CryoTanks (Patch by @Zorg )  Recommanded for people who want more realistic cryogenic fuel

Optional Dependencies

- RetractableLiftingSurface ( Add a steerable Parafoil )

 

Knes parts in picture :

  Reveal hidden contents

 

 

Download:  SpaceDock / Github / Curse

i don't have tested but Knes is supposed to have a retro-compatibilty for KSP 1.4 (oldest KSP with part variant)

(GOOGLE TRASNLATE)

Hello Well! Congratulations on dedicating your time on all this ... and YES, it's on my list of favorites.
(Actually, I only heard about French projects because of you, so ... thanks!!! )

I am building a new career with specific parts of mods and, this time, I would like to keep in the game only the parts necessary for the ATV such as body, antennas, solar panels, adapters, docking ports, etc etc ... Can you help me with that?

One question: is the robotic arm in the mod functional, like the canadarm, or is it decorative? (only manage to move in one direction)

11 hours ago, KallangoVerde said:

I am building a new career with specific parts of mods and, this time, I would like to keep in the game only the parts necessary for the ATV such as body, antennas, solar panels, adapters, docking ports, etc etc ... Can you help me with that?

One question: is the robotic arm in the mod functional, like the canadarm, or is it decorative? (only manage to move in one direction)

- Delete everything in GameData\Knes\Parts except the ATV-folder.

- No, it don`t work like a canadarm. It works like a grappling hook or like the stock claw.

19 minutes ago, Cheesecake said:

except the ATV-folder

And except Core folder. Shared assets there.

7 hours ago, Cheesecake said:

- Exclua tudo em GameData \ Knes \ Parts, exceto a pasta ATV.

- Não, não funciona como um canadarmo. Funciona como um gancho ou como uma garra de estoque.

 

6 hours ago, Hohmannson said:

E exceto a pasta Core. Ativos compartilhados lá.

thank you guys!
Will there ever be waterfall configs for all the parts?

Sorry i didn't connect too much with the Forum, i didn't really play KSP since the last release, really busy irl.

I just tried 1.9.5 on a Ariane 44L. It seems that waterfall has some issues:
- I have a crackling sound right away on the launch pad, like static noise out of a radio
- Had a night start and would not see any effect on L-33 and HM7

So far just noting this, didn't have time to dig deeper to find causes for this.

5 minutes ago, chris-kerbal said:

I just tried 1.9.5 on a Ariane 44L. It seems that waterfall has some issues:
- I have a crackling sound right away on the launch pad, like static noise out of a radio
- Had a night start and would not see any effect on L-33 and HM7
